verses.roman:
eta kahi' rātri-kāle karena cintana
kemane chāḍimu raghunāthera caraṇa

synonyms: eta kahi'-saying this; rātri-kāle—at night; karena cintana—began to think; kemane—how; chāḍimu—shall I give up; raghu-nāthera caraṇa—the lotus feet of Lord Raghunātha?'
translation: "After saying this, at night he began to think, 'How shall I give up the lotus feet of Lord Raghunātha?'
